recipesJson.name: Dulcestone
recipesJson.author: SkiddlzNinja
recipesJson.description: A dulce de leche flavor made for the Noted Podcast June 5, 2017. Meant to be used as a stone, or can be used alone for a rich dulce de leche flavor without the artificial chocolate notes.

reviews.text: Light caramel and brown sugar in a pretty authentic-tasting milk base.  What else is there to say besides dammit this is good?
